about_the_game:
Bobo Bay is a pet simulation game where you collect, mash(breed), accessorize, and train little creatures to compete in races and other competitions.

Lots of bobos

There are thousands of combinations of Bobos you can make even in this alpha. Body color, eye color, body part shapes, patterns, stats, personality traits, etc will all change with each Bobo you find or mash! Distinct Bobo traits and moods will completely change how you interact and care for your Bobos. Don't forget to dress them up in a fancy little top hat as well.



Bobos start their life as Saplings. Then they grow into a Seedling which is basically their young adult form. As the Bobo ages and changes based on their stats, they will reach a final Bud form. Finally, at some point, the Bobo will Sprout and offer you the chance to let it evolve!

Competitions galore

Races are the main event in this Bobo world. Different companies and organizations from around the globe sponsor different competition series and award unique prizes! Bring your Bobos along to the BRAND NEW AND VERY CLEAN COMPETITION CENTER to enter them into a competition. Take part in races with breakable boards and balance beams at Lake Pip National Park or go for a long swim at Kee Kee Station.

Once you get more Bobos, sign them all up for a team relay race!

Courtyard strolling

Walk through the Competition Center Courtyard to buy accessories for your Bobos to wear, purchase snacks for your Bobo to eat, or get mashers and animal crackers from the shady Jud.

Check the clock

The time and date are very important! All competitions have scheduled dates they will be held. Check the competition calendar on the Competition Center Jumbotron to sign up for any competitions that seem tempting! Some competitions will take place every day, while others might only happen once a week. Plan ahead and make sure your Bobos are ready to eradicate the competition when the time comes.
